field.fieldname: case (select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMcomplaints.BillDate) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMcomplaints.BillDate)) when 0 then 0 else convert(numeric(18, 2),count(CRMcomplaints.BillNO)/(convert(numeric(18, 2),(select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMcomplaints.BillDate) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMcomplaints.BillDate))))) end

SQL.text: select vbCrLf cast(year(CRMcomplaints.BillDate) as varchar(10))+'.'+cast(month(CRMcomplaints.BillDate) as varchar(10)) as createTime,vbCrLf case (select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMcomplaints.BillDate) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMcomplaints.BillDate)) when 0 then 0 else convert(numeric(18, 2),count(CRMcomplaints.BillNO)/(convert(numeric(18, 2),(select count(*) from ViewCRMCompanyAll b where b.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient' and b.BillDate>=@condition:BillDate_s and b.BillDate<=@condition:BillDate_e and year(b.BillDate)=year(CRMcomplaints.BillDate) and month(b.BillDate)=month(CRMcomplaints.BillDate))))) end as CompanyNamevbCrLffrom CRMcomplaintsvbCrLfleft join ViewCRMCompanyAll on ViewCRMCompanyAll.id=CRMcomplaints.f_brothervbCrLfwhere 1=1 vbCrLf and ViewCRMCompanyAll.companycategory='tblCMCompleteClient'vbCrLf and (CRMcomplaints.BillDate >=?)vbCrLf and (CRMcomplaints.BillDate <=?)vbCrLfgroup by vbCrLf year(CRMcomplaints.BillDate),vbCrLf month(CRMcomplaints.BillDate)vbCrLfvbCrLf
